name: cursor0x0
description:
cursor0x0 is a collection of various cursor mini games that require a good reaction, stamina, and precision. Fight enemies, win races, dodge bullets, complete different goals to unlock new challenge types and reach the final level!

  • 30+ levels testing different mouse control skills: dodging, racing, stunts, drag and drop, etc. and bosses that require to demonstrate what you've learned to beat them. Every level features something special.
  • Three difficulty settings: from Rookie, suitable for new players, to almost unbeatable Expert one.
  • Local multiplayer for 2-4 players allowing to connect multiple mice and compete with friends.
  • More than a hundred of extra goals, making the levels harder. It will be a long journey to beat them all!
